column1: Dombivli is a city located near Mumbai in the Thane district of Maharashtra state

Dombivli is located at 19.218433°N 73.086718°E﻿ / 19.218433; 73.086718. It has an average elevation of 13.534 meters (44.403 feet). The land here is rough and rocky by nature. The climate is warm and humid.
Dombivli is served by Mumbai Suburban railway network
column2: i.e. it lies on the main line of the central section of Mumbai suburban railway network. Built in 1886
column3: it is one of the busiest stations on the Central line and witnesses a footfall of more than 300 thousand commuters daily. Though none of the long journey express trains halt here
column4: it is well connected to Mumbai and Navi Mumbai through Thane. Though during rush hours the station is an unacceptably over-crowded affair. Distance between Dombivli and Thane is 25 km (16 mi).
